# Shawn Schwartz

> Software engineer, data scientist, and researcher building tools at the intersection of technology and science.

## About

Shawn Schwartz is a PhD candidate at Stanford University specializing in neuroscience and computer science. Former Data Scientist at Slack. He builds developer tools, scientific software, and open-source packages that help researchers and developers work more efficiently.

- Website: https://shawnschwartz.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/shawntz
- Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=xII63_wAAAAJ
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/shawnts
- Email: hey@shawnschwartz.com

## Research Interests

- Episodic Memory
- Attention
- Cognitive Aging
- Neuroimaging (fMRI)
- Human Performance

## Software & Tools

For detailed information about each project, see: https://shawnschwartz.com/llms-full.txt

### eyeris (R Package)
CRAN package for preprocessing and analyzing pupillometry data. Automates artifact detection, blink interpolation, baseline correction, and generates analysis-ready datasets.
- URL: https://shawnschwartz.com/eyeris
- CRAN: https://cran.r-project.org/package=eyeris
- Use case: Researchers analyzing eye-tracking pupil data

### charisma (R Package)
CRAN package for automated preprocessing and analysis of heart rate data from wearable devices and physiological sensors.
- URL: https://shawnschwartz.com/charisma
- Use case: Researchers analyzing heart rate/HRV data

### fMRIPrep Workbench
Docker-based CLI tool for streamlined fMRI data preprocessing using fMRIPrep. Simplifies neuroimaging workflows with automated BIDS validation and parallel processing.
- URL: https://shawnschwartz.com/fmriprep-workbench
- Use case: Neuroscientists preprocessing fMRI data

### clementime
macOS menu bar app built with SwiftUI for time tracking and productivity.
- URL: https://clementime.app
- Platform: macOS (SwiftUI)

### cassh
macOS SSH connection manager built with Go. Lightweight terminal-based tool for managing SSH connections.
- URL: https://shawnschwartz.com/cassh
- Platform: macOS (Go)

### TinyVault
Self-hosted secrets management solution using Python and Docker.
- URL: https://github.com/shawntz/tinyvault
- Use case: Developers needing lightweight secrets management

## Citation Metrics

- Citations: 340+
- h-index: 11
- i10-index: 12

## Expertise

- Languages: Python, R, TypeScript, Swift, Go
- Domains: Data Science, Machine Learning, Neuroimaging, iOS/macOS Development
